name: Spooky Town
description:
Halloween nowadays it's all about eating candy, wear costumes and have fun. Nobody is scared of zombies, vampires or skeletons anymore...a true blasphemy! 

The Reaper is sick of this nonsense and is determined to bring back Halloween's true spirit!

Will you become his ally and help him scare all the brats in the village once and for all?

This game is my end of degree project and I've made it in three months. I have never done a game before, so please, all the feedback will be very well received in order to learn and improve! I hope you enjoy it! :) 

It is a mobile game for Android which combines Idle, Farming, City-building and RTS mechanics. 

The main goal is to scare all the people in the village and bring back Halloween's true spirit. To do that, you will need to summon monsters with special resources. And to produce those resources you will need to build different types of constructions. 

As it is an Idle game, the constructions will be always producing, even when you are offline!
